entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Local blowing snow early this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 20 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming partly cloudy this evening with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
